sentences.en: A little bracing roughness is better than spoiling him.
sentences.cn: 令人精神振作的微弱粗暴比娇宠他要好得多.

sentences.en: For a good bond, an adhesive must counteract the effect of surface roughness and boundary layers.
sentences.cn: 为了取得很好的粘结, 粘结剂必须能克服表面粗糙和边界层的反应.

sentences.en: Friction increases with increasing fiber surface roughness in the boundary and semiboundary.
sentences.cn: 在边界和半边界区内,摩擦随纤维表面粗糙度的增加而增加.
他对自己的粗鲁感到后悔。

sentences.en: His manner was even dignified : quite divested of roughness , though too stern for grace.
sentences.cn: 他的举止简直是庄重,不带一点粗野,然而严竣有余, 文雅不足.

sentences.en: I have no patience with his roughness.
Mares are surprisingly tolerant of the roughness and rudeness of their own offspring.
sentences.cn: 母马容忍后代粗暴和野蛮的程度教人意外.

sentences.en: On a more refined level, we can distinguish degrees of roughness, intensity and shade of color.
sentences.cn: 在比较精确的水平上, 我们可以区别粗糙度, 强度和色度.

sentences.en: Roughness of the skin can be caused by bad diet.
sentences.cn: 饮食不好可能引起皮肤粗糙.

sentences.en: She rested her cheek against the roughness of his jacket.
sentences.cn: 她把脸颊靠在他粗糙的夹克上。

sentences.en: The contribution of the guide surface roughness overshadows that of the fiber surface roughness.
sentences.cn: 导纱杆表面粗糙度的作用超过纤维表面的粗糙度.

sentences.en: The exponent P is a function of wind speed, ground roughness, stability, etc.
sentences.cn: 指数P是风速 、 地面不平度 、 稳定度等的函数.

sentences.en: There was little roughness in the sport, and much playfulness.
sentences.cn: 在这种竞技中粗野少而玩笑多.

sentences.en: There was little roughness in the spot and much playfulness.
sentences.cn: 这场游戏中粗鲁的成份少,快活的成份多.

sentences.en: This roughness occurs on a small scale, involving grain boundaries and failure surfaces.
sentences.cn: 小规模的粗糙度涉及到颗粒边缘和破坏表面.

words.tran_cn: 粗糙的；粗略的；粗野的；艰苦的；未经加工的
粗暴对待的；喧闹打斗的
略粗糙的；略粗暴的；有点刺耳的；略有风浪的
艰苦；高低不平的地面；未经加工的材料；粗糙的部分
粗饲料；粗粮；粗糙的原料
骚乱；大吵大闹；大打出手
粗鲁的人，粗暴的人；流氓，无赖
粗糙（度）；粗暴；猛烈；篷乱毛发；未加工

phrases.tran_cn: 表面粗糙度；表面光洁度

trans.tran_cn: 粗糙，粗暴，粗糙的地方，（暴风雨的）猛烈
